content: Hey all, I'd like to contribute documentation examples to the experimental std::simd. Would this be welcomed -- is it a good time for that?

Welcome! I know some work is happening (see https://github.com/rust-lang/portable-simd/pull/270 for example), so I suspect there's interest in more rustdoc examples too. I suggest joining the #project-portable-simd stream here, if you haven't already, as most of the related conversation is happening there.
@Sean Stangl Yeah, PRs are welcome! They should be against the upstream portable-simd repo, which we subtree into rust-lang/rust.
